content: try this easy to follow crochet glasses case pattern that includes detailed step by step instructions with many photos this easy crochet pouch pattern will help you make your own crochet accessory to protect your reading glasses or your favourite sunglasses with ease so don t hesitate and get started now and remember that i am happy to provide support with any of my crochet patterns if needed happy crocheting details skill level begginer crochet skills and knowledge gauge 2 x 2 10 stitches x 9 worked row terminology us crochet terminology notes only available in english the below sizing is based on the use of medium #4 = worsted yarn and 4mm = g/6 crochet hook width 8 5cm 3 5 length 16 5cm 6 5 this crochet glasses case pattern consists of - step by step pattern descriptions including lots of photos for guidance - information about materials and equipment needed - list of abbreviations used in the pattern - links to helpful video tutorials materials needed - this pattern will work nicely with 100% cotton 100% acrylic or a blend of acrylic and cotton - recommended yarn weight medium #4 = worsted i used - medium #4 = worsted - 100% cotton - lion brand 24/7 cotton - colour denim 108 - 100g/170m - lion brand 24/7 cotton - colour amber 186g - 100g/170m - lion brand 24/7 cotton - colour jade 178 - 100g/170m - weight/yardage to make one case 30g/51m equipment needed - crochet hook i used 4mm = g/6 hook but refer to the instructions on your yarn label if using different weight of yarn - scissors tapestry needle stitch marker button i used a button that is 2 5cm 1 in diameter you may sell the crochet items you made using this crochet glasses case pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer
